# position

**Instance Property**

The location of the element in the shared coordinate space.

## Declaration

```swift
let position: SpatialTemplateElementPosition
```

## Discussion

This property contains the distance from the coordinate space’s origin along the x- and y-axes.

## Getting the element details

- **direction**: The initial orientation of the element in the shared coordinate space.
- **role**: An optional role you associate with this element.
